#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    char s[1000005];
    char sub [3] = {'L','O','L'};
        scanf("%s",s);
    
        long long int i,j,n=strlen(s)+1;
        long long dp[n][4];
        for( i =0; i<n;i++)
            dp[i][0] =1;
        for( i=1; i<4; i++)
            dp[0][i] =0;
        
        for( i=1; i<n; i++)
        {
            for( j=1; j<4; j++)
            {
                if( s[i-1] == sub[j-1])
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j]+ dp[i-1][j-1];
                else
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
            }
 
        }
        printf("%lld\n",dp[n-1][3]);
    }
    return 0;
}
